Caption:
The hope of the ungodly is like thistledown carried by the wind,
and like a light frost driven away by a storm;
it is dispersed like smoke before the wind,
and it passes like the remembrance of a guest who stays but a day.

But the righteous live forever,
and their reward is with the Lord;
the Most High takes care of them.
Therefore they will receive a glorious crown
and a beautiful diadem from the hand of the Lord,
because with his right hand he will cover them,
and with his arm he will shield them.
-- Wisdom 5:1‚Äì5, 14‚Äì16

The choice between standing in the rain and yelling at a closed door, and being with my friends inside a space of love and safety, is an easy one.

Caption:
This week a statement opposing same sex marriage was blocked by bishops in the Anglican Church of Australia's equivalent of parliament. This was in response to two churches who successfully blessed same sex marriage. The statement was designed to prevent that in the future.

The conservatives who have their own sub-faction called #GAFCON wrote a response about how they literally cried at the decision. GAFCON have previously made headlines for publicly endorsing laws that would see gay people face death in Uganda. Cool and normal /s.

The @sydneyanglicans shared the news on Facebook and most of the comments were about wanting to publicly name and shame those who voted against the conservative statement on marriage. Also cool and normal /s. 

The Sydney Anglicans and GAFCON members struggle to understand that there are faithful Christians who affirm same sex marriage. They'll either split off from the rest (good riddance) or stick around and continue to throw tantrums.

It's also worth noting that the Sydney Anglicans are massive hypocrites. They keep referring to Matthew 19 being the definition of marriage, however in 2018 they moved a motion to widen the scope of acceptable divorce within the church. They went beyond Matthew 19 which only allows for sexual unfaithfulness and expanded that to include spousal abuse. That was a good decision to protect suffering people (albeit way too late), but nevertheless is an expansion of the text that they love so much. So if they could do it then, they could do it now for same sex couples.

.
.
#deconstruction #exvangelical #deconstructingfaith #deconstructing #openchristian #affirming #affirmingchurch #christianity #sydneyanglicans #anglican
